name: How To Scam And Make Lots of Money
description: A classic strategy guide by an anonymous writer on how to scam people.

name: The Department of Truth: The Complete Conspiracy: Volume 1 - 5
description: A shadowy agency manipulates reality by turning conspiracy theories into truth.

name: Behind a Pale Horse: The Forbidden Edition
description: A former naval officer exposes government secrets, alien cover-ups, and the New World Order.

name: The Men Who Stare at Goats
description: A secretive military unit, psychic warfare, and a goat that never stood a chance — the truth is stranger than fiction.

name: Tinfoil: The Hat Pro Edition
description: Stay safe from the Government and the Aliens. Everything you need in one pack!

name: Cryptid Spotter Sunglasses
description: These shades reveal things hidden to the naked eye — like alien footsteps!

name: Men in Black Tie
description: A sleek black tie with binary code stitched in. Professional... or suspicious?

name: Reptilian Repellent Bracelet
description: A 'handcrafted' fashionable bracelet that's 100% effective. Trust us.

name: Area 51 Mystery Box
description: Includes classified documents, alien plushies, and a fake Area 51 clearance ID — there might be more, or less...

name: Flat Earth Explorer's Kit
description: Comes with a compass (that ONLY points to the truth), outdated maps, and a DIY globe!

name: Build-Your-Own Crop Circle Kit
description: This kit has everything you need to make your own crop circle — grass included!

name: 'Real Frequencies' Cassette
description: Plays static, coded messages, and a mysterious voice whispering 'they're listening'...

name: The Truth Frequency USB
description: Includes random encrypted files from Government HQ, redacted images, and leaked alien audio threats.

name: Moon Landing Soundtrack
description: Actual recording of the moon landing. (Or is it?)

name: Illuminati Night Light
description: This unique night lamp watches those who watch it. Dare your luck?

name: Alien Skeleton Fridge Magnet
description: This specific magnet is an exact replica of the piece recovered from Roswell — and one lucky buyer might get a surprise!

name: Interdimensional Portal Keychain
description: This unique piece glows faintly... and could be nothing — or something more.

name: Government Redaction Coloring Book
description: A copy of top-secret FBI files. Use your markers to censor what *you* think they should hide.

name: Bigfoot's Diary
description: This could contain the secrets and final thoughts of the infamous Bigfoot before he was caught. Dare to find out?

name: Time Traveler's Calendar 2025
description: Calendars can be tricky, but this one? It's encrypted in alien tongue. Grab yours before time runs out!
